questions.question: Read the following text about walking and answer the questions:
readingText: Walking is one of the easiest and most popular forms of exercise. You don't need special equipment or expensive gym memberships. You can walk anywhere - in your neighborhood, at the park, or even inside a shopping mall.

Regular walking has many health benefits. It helps strengthen your heart and lungs. Walking for 30 minutes a day can help you lose weight and feel more energetic. It also reduces stress and improves your mood.

Walking is also good for your bones and muscles. As you get older, walking helps prevent bone loss and keeps your muscles strong. Many doctors recommend walking to their patients because it's a safe exercise for people of all ages.
The best thing about walking is that you can do it with friends or family. It's a great way to spend time together while staying healthy. You can talk and enjoy nature at the same time.
